ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Greetings fellow Questers
ygData.msgSnippet: Well if you have luclin, I say head on over to Paludal Caverns. There is no better place from 15-25.  You can level 3 times in a few hours of consistent good
ygData.messageBody:
Well if you have luclin, I say head on over to Paludal
Caverns. There is no better place from 15-25. You can
level 3 times in a few hours of consistent good play.
Only thing is, get yourself someone who can cure
Disease because Creeping Crud is a bad bad thing.

If not, you can do Oasis until 18 or head to the High
Hold Pass, which is hard to find a group because of
paludal but still is good. Or, go to unrest and fight
in the yard.

Good Luck Friend

Rob
--- Clay <wolffmanus@...> wrote:
> I have mostly played Shamans and have had a blast.
> Thanks to the
> others here I have been able to advance my Shaman
> into the high 20s.
>
> I now have a problem and again ask for some help...I
> am trying a Bar.
> Beastlord.
>
> I now need to find a place to move on to and advance
> in levels, with
> my shaman I found I "ran in to a wall" at 15th level
> and it was like
> pulling teeth to make 16th , 17 and 18th levels. I
> want of avoid this
> with my BL.
>
> I have made it to 15th level (thanks to Mammoth
> calfs and wrath orc
> wristbands) I have all my spells for 15th level,
> most of my armor is
> magic or BL newbee Quest armor. I have the Newbee
> Claw,and a harpoon
> I could use a better hth weapon but by all acounts I
> am doing good.
>
> Where does a 15th level Bar. Beastlord hunt to make
> levels in good
> time?
>
> I thank you and will keep you all informed on how I
> do.
>
> Wolff
>
>
>
